root.name: WWE Crush Hour
root.description: OverviewWWE Crush Hour features more than 30 fantasy Superstar vehicles including Hollywood Hulk Hogan's sports car, Big Show's big rig, The Rock's luxury sports car and Stone Cold Steve Austin's jacked up monster truck. Players will be able to compete in multiple match types including ladder and hardcore matches. World Wrestling Entertainment fans can also fight opponents with multiple weapons customized for each vehicle or grab power-ups to gain a temporary bonus.Crush Hour a physics engine equipped with something called the "Powerslide Advantage" allowing quick 180 degree turns, strafing attacks and pinpoint cornering. World Wrestling Entertainment's very own Jim Ross gives on-the-fly commentary and players will be able to taunt opposing drivers with signature phrases from their favorite Superstar.WWE Crush Hour was an attempt to take the WWE licence and transplant it into a non-wrestling videogame, something that hadn't been attempted since the Game Boy Colour side-scrolling beat-'em-up, WWF Betrayal.UnlockablesUnlock all levels and vehiclesAt the main menu press Square, L2, R2, Circle, Square, L1, L1, L2 (This is only temporary)Unlock Demolition Derby ModeBeat any arena without firing a weapon to unlock Demolition Derby mode.Unlock WWE Heavyweight TitleBeat 1 season with any RAW superstar to see them with the WWE Heavyweight Title at the character select screen.Unlock WWE World TitleBeat 1 season with any SmackDown! superstar to see them with the WWE World Title at the character select screen.Unlockable CharactersBradshaw- Beat season mode with Brock LesnarChristian- Beat season mode with Chris JerichoD-Von Dudley- Beat 1 season with Bubba Ray DudleyHulk Hogan- Beat Survivor Series in Season Mode as The RockKevin Nash- While in the Main Menu or Superstar select press L2, Square, R2, CircleLita- Beat Survivor Series in Season Mode as Matt HardyRic Flair- Beat Survivor Series in Season Mode as Triple H or beat 1 season with Big Show, Triple H, or Rob Van DamStephanie McMahon- Beat Survivor Series in Season Mode as Kurt AngleVince McMahon- Beat 1 season with ''Stone Cold'' Steve AustinGameplay CodesUnlock all levels and vehiclesAt the main menu press Square, L2, R2, Circle, Square, L1, L1, L2 (This is only temporary)Simulate all seasons wonAt the main menu press L2, R2, Square, Circle, R1, R1, L1, Circle, CircleSpecial meter grows 5 times fasterAt the pause menu hold L3, press Triangle, Circle, Circle, Circle, CircleUnlimited turboAt the pause menu hold L3, press X, L1, R1, R2, Triangle
